content: single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet around 6 - f/o leave long tail for sewing tail - begin with purple 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 6 single_crochet around 6 - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2024 icrochetthings 5/5 assembly sew the ears onto the top of the body sew two paws onto the front of the body above the rings sew two paws onto the bottom of the body sew the tail onto the back of the body use dark blue yarn to embroider eyes and a mouth onto the body copyright © 2024 icrochetthings
